description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/19/02857 (excavation of single storey basement beneath building footprint and part of garden; amendment to front lightwell; replacement rear garage with garden area; alterations to elevations and fenestration) to remove door from first floor and reinstate this portion of chimney; installation of metal parapet reducing extent of glazing, at ground floor; change detailing to mad make lower ground floor less heavier; removal of two windows in lighwell at lower ground and basement levels; relocate entrance gate, moved further away from corner of Lansdowne Road/St John's Gardens; and, detail of Lansdowne Road railing included to match that of St John's  Gardens
